reasoning_trace:
I initially considered someone simply eating a strawberry, but that lacks narrative engagement. I then thought about a pastry chef decorating a tart, which is better but perhaps too professional. I settled on a relatable home kitchen scenario: washing strawberries. This allows for a dynamic physical interaction where water pressure causes a strawberry to 'escape' the bowl, creating a small, realistic moment of minor chaos and reaction.
The original start shows a person about to wash strawberries, and the end shows them reacting to a strawberry that has escaped the bowl. To introduce a surreal twist that remains consistent with these markers, I replaced the physical bounce of the fruit with an impossible action: the strawberry sprouts tiny, fluttering wings to avoid the water stream and flies across the counter.
synopsis: While preparing to wash a bowl of strawberries, one of the berries spontaneously develops wings and flies away from the running water, forcing the person to chase after it.

normal_timeline.start_caption: [0-3s] A person holds a white ceramic bowl filled with ripe strawberries under a kitchen faucet, their hand poised on the handle.
normal_timeline.middle_caption: [3-7s] The person turns the faucet on; a strong stream of water hits the strawberries, causing one to bounce out of the bowl and roll quickly across the granite countertop.
normal_timeline.end_caption: [7-10s] The person quickly turns off the water and reaches out to grab the runaway strawberry, shaking their head slightly.

timeline.start_caption: [0-3s] A person holds a white ceramic bowl filled with ripe strawberries under a kitchen faucet, their hand poised on the handle.
timeline.middle_caption: [3-7s] As the person turns the faucet on, one strawberry suddenly sprouts tiny, translucent insect wings and flutters out of the bowl, hovering momentarily before flying rapidly across the granite countertop to avoid the water.
timeline.end_caption: [7-10s] The person quickly turns off the water and reaches out to grab the runaway strawberry, shaking their head slightly.

final_t2v_prompt:
Realistic Style: - [0-3s] A person holds a white ceramic bowl filled with ripe strawberries under a kitchen faucet, their hand poised on the handle.
- [3-7s] As the person turns the faucet on, one strawberry suddenly sprouts tiny, translucent insect wings and flutters out of the bowl, hovering momentarily before flying rapidly across the granite countertop to avoid the water.
- [7-10s] The person quickly turns off the water and reaches out to grab the runaway strawberry, shaking their head slightly.

reviewer_audit.reason: The script perfectly adheres to the [Setup -> Twist -> Reaction] structure. The START (0-3s) is pure setup, showing the person preparing to wash the strawberries. The MIDDLE (3-7s) contains a clear and surreal twist: a strawberry sprouts wings and flies away. The END (7-10s) shows a simple, direct reaction to the twist: turning off the water and reaching for the strawberry. The transitions are logical and continuous.
